import {Picker} from '@react-native-picker/picker';
import React, { useState } from "react";
import { View, Text, SafeAreaView, ScrollView, StyleSheet, Image, Button, TouchableOpacity, FlatList } from "react-native";


export default function ProductList ({navigation, route}) {
    
    const [selectedColor, setSelectedColor] = useState();
    

    return(
        <FlatList vertical showsVerticalScrollIndicator = {true}>
            <Text>Dresses</Text>
            <View style = {styles.container}>
                <Picker
                    selectedValue={selectedLanguage} onValueChange={(itemValue, itemIndex) => setSelectedLanguage(itemValue)}>
                    <Picker.Item label="Java" value="java" />
                    <Picker.Item label="JavaScript" value="js" />
                </Picker>
            </View>

        </FlatList>
        
        
    )
}


const styles = StyleSheet.create({
    container: {

    }
})



/**
 * 
 *  <Filter>
                    <FilterText>Filter Products:</FilterText>
                    <Select>

                            Color
                        </Option>
                        <Option>White</Option>
                        <Option>Black</Option>
                        <Option>Red</Option>
                        <Option>Blue</Option>
                        <Option>Yellow</Option>
                        <Option>Green</Option>
                    </Select>
                    <Select>
                        <Option disabled selected>
                            Size
                        </Option>
                        <Option>XS</Option>
                        <Option>S</Option>
                        <Option>M</Option>
                        <Option>L</Option>
                        <Option>XL</Option>
                    </Select>
                    </Filter> 
                <Filter>
 */
